text: No muri bo hari abagutega amatwi (usoma Qur’an), ariko twashyize ibipfuko ku mitima yabo kugira ngo batayisobanukirwa, tunaziba amatwi yabo. Kandi iyo babonye buri kimenyetso (kigaragaza ukuri), ntibacyemera; kugeza ubwo bakugezeho bakugisha impaka, maze ba bandi bahakanye bakavuga bati “Ibi nta kindi biri cyo usibye kuba ari inkuru z’abo hambere.”
